names.english: decoction of poria for inducing diuresis
names.commonEnglish: Decoction of Poria for Inducing Diuresis

actions: Drives out water through the urine and stool, reduces swelling and disperses nodules.
With Chi Xiao Dou, for edema and abdominal distention, shortness of breath, and urinary difficulty.
Clears Heat, promotes urination and inhibits the growth of cancer cells.
With Chi Xiao Dou, for jaundice and edema due to Damp-Heat.
Promotes urination, reduces edema, clears Damp Heat, disperses Blood Stasis, reduces swelling, reduces Fire toxicity and dispels pus.
Drives out water through the urine and stool
Inhibits the growth of cancer cells

symptoms: Yang jaundice (sclera and skin bright yellow)
Pain and fullness in ribs on both sides
Maybe pain in the right hypochondrium
Women: Yellow vaginal discharge with foul smell Pruritis vulvae
Men: Pain, swelling and burning sensations of testicles
manifestations.tongue: Pink with red tip and edges
manifestations.pulse: Wiry and rapid or Slippery and rapid
